name: Mr. Bits Bad Day
description:
A simple 2D platformer I made for Game Off 2022. Help Mr. Bits collect all his loose screws before the time runs out, and try and improve your times!

This is my first actual completed ("completed") game and I'm sure there's all manner of bugs, but I hope you enjoy nonetheless!

Code is here if interested: https://github.com/bloyot/GO2022
